events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I want to request a refund because the size was incorrect and I no longer need the item.
The reported issue has been classified under the refund category due to the customer's request for money back on an incorrect size item.
An agent from the refunds department has been assigned to handle this case and will respond to the customer shortly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm here to assist you with your refund request for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or washed? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The jacket is brand new, unworn, and in its original packaging, ready to be returned.
Thank you for the information. You can return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly, and once received, we will process your full refund.

We confirm that your refund has been issued successfully after receiving the returned jacket. Please allow a few days for the amount to reflect in your bank account.
Just following up to check if you have received the refund and if everything is satisfactory with the resolution provided.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thanks a lot for your prompt assistance and clear communication throughout the process.
We are glad your issue was resolved to your satisfaction. Closing the case now. Feel free to contact us if you need any further assistance.
A short customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather your feedback on the support experience related to your refund request.
